item.title: About
item.description: About Statemachines are useful especially in cases where there are few resources such as in embedded applications. While useful, they are annoying to write. There are a bunch of tools and languages, why this one? I was looking for the following: Didn’t want an extra language that needed to be converted. Wanted to be able to write it directly without the tool if you wanted. Wanted to be able to write it directly, and then use the tool and switch back and forth.
